rows.label: qev070104_MSG0001
rows.name:
Who does that? Who calls someone in and and tells
them that they have to time travel? Sure I'm curious,
but I also want to stay alive, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070104_MSG0002
rows.name:
This time I'm putting my foot down, all right?
If he's so sure it's safe, he can do it himself, can't he?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070104_MSG0003
rows.name:
I...made it? This is New LA three thousand years in the
future? I guess it does kind of of look vaguely more...
future-y.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070104_MSG0004
rows.name: ...Huh? How are YOU in this time period?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070104_MSG0005
rows.name:
Oh, I get it. You're [ST:playername ]'s distant
descendant, correct?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070104_MSG0006
rows.name:
You must have been chosen to greet me as the
ambassador of your time because you'd be familiar
with the the situation, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070104_MSG0007
rows.name:
So, um, what's happened on Mira in these last
three millennia?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070104_MSG0008
rows.name:
Looking around, the surroundings have changed so so
little. It's actually kind of...uncanny?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070104_MSG0009
rows.name:
But I'll get to the bottom of this mystery, you know?
I'm an agent of science, after allâ€”just like Professor B.[ST:wait ]
